name: file-trail
description: Track file and directory visits with completion detection for Node.js. TypeScript library that helps you know what you've seen and when you've finished exploring directories. Includes serialization support.
author: Brian Kotos

scripts.e2e: npm run build && cd e2e && npm test
scripts.publish:patch: npm run test:no-watch && npm run e2e && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run test:no-watch && npm run e2e && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run test:no-watch && npm run e2e && npm version major && npm publish
